full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=============================

### Tender Details

| Title (English) | Title (French) | Reference Number | Amendment Number | Solicitation Number | Publication Date | Tender Closing Date | Amendment Date | Expected Contract Start Date | Tender Status |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Purchase of SA Office Seating | Achat de fauteuils AMA | WS3751404781-Doc3751413539 | 4 | WS3751404781 | November 17, 2022 | December 8, 2022, 2:00 PM EST | December 5, 2022 | None | Expired |

### Tender Invitation

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites bidders to submit a proposal for the acquisition, delivery, and installation of office seating in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

### Tender Requirements

* Bids must be submitted by 2:00 PM EST on December 8, 2022.
* Late bids will be declared non-responsive.
* The contract shall be awarded based on the lowest price.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to bidders who are signatories to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Delivery Location

The office seating shall be delivered and installed in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

### Contracting Entity

* Name:  Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact: Lavoie, Corine (elle-la / she-her), corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14666236?extsite=MTQ2NjYyMzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Tender Description

This Request for Proposal (RFP) seeks the acquisition, delivery, and installation of office seating in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, as detailed
